body:
Dear colleagues,

you are cordially invited to attend our workshop on Enhanced Photon
Mapping in RADIANCE hosted by The Lucerne University of Applied Sciences
and Arts on May 29th. We will be presenting technologies and applications
of the Enhanced Photon Mapping in Radiance as developed by CC EASE.

For programme and free registration, please visit
https://www.hslu.ch/en/lucerne-school-of-engineering-architecture/campus/veranstaltungen/2015/05/29/cc-ease-150529-epm-workshop/

Looking forward to seeing you. Best regards,

--Roland


--
Dr. Roland Schregle
Senior Research Associate

Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts
School of Engineering and Architecture
CC Envelopes and Solar Energy (EASE)
www.hslu.ch/ccease

T direct: +41 41 349 36 26 (New)
roland.schregle at hslu.ch

Technikumstrasse 21, CH-6048 Horw (Correspondence)
Ebenaustrasse 20, CH-6048 Horw (Office)
T +41 41 349 33 11, F +41 41 349 39 60
